title: Texas Senate Dems walk out over redistricting bill
shortDescription: Texas Senate Democrats staged a walkout over a controversial redistricting measure, but Republicans still passed it 19-2.

title: Smithsonian faces Trump-era exhibit review
shortDescription: The Trump administration ordered the Smithsonian to align exhibits with American exceptionalism.

title: Trump launches Smithsonian review amid culture war campaign
shortDescription: The review seeks to "remove divisive or partisan narratives, and restore confidence in our shared cultural institutions," according to a letter.

title: Trump may sue Fed over renovation costs
shortDescription: President Donald Trump may sue the Federal Reserve over its $2.5B headquarters renovation project.

title: Trump takeover shows why DC should be 51st state, mayor says
shortDescription: “America needs to know why your nation’s capital, a place where 700,000 tax-paying Americans live, should be the 51st state,” said DC Mayor Muriel Bowser.

title: Trump's pick to lead BLS suggests suspending monthly jobs reports
shortDescription: E.J. Antoni, Trump's pick as commissioner of Labor Statistics, recently endorsed halting monthly jobs reports until the methodology is changed.

title: Where does Trump stand on gay marriage? SCOTUS faces chance to revisit
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has opposed and supported marriage equality. Now the Supreme Court is being asked to overturn the right to same-sex marriage.

title: Trump may sue the Fed amid his ongoing campaign against Powell
shortDescription: “At this moment in time the president is considering a lawsuit against the Fed," White House Press Secretary Karoline Leavitt said Aug. 12.

title: Ukraine's 'oceanfront property': Trump and the real estate presidency
shortDescription: Framing intractable issues in terms of real estate also appears to be how Donald Trump orients himself - a way to process and understand.

title: Ashley Biden, daughter of Joe Biden, files for divorce from husband
shortDescription: The former first daughter filed the paperwork in Philidelphia on Monday, Aug. 11. She was married to Dr. Howard Krein for 13 years.

title: Russian troops advance in Ukraine ahead of Trump-Putin peace summit
shortDescription: Ahead of a summit in Alaska between Trump and Putin, Russian troops continued their campaign to take full control of Ukraine's Donetsk region.

title: Takeaways from Trump's control of DC police
shortDescription: Republicans are pushing the Bowser Act to revoke D.C. autonomy as President Trump hints at federal control over cities.

title: Former Ohio Sen. Sherrod Brown to run for Senate in 2026
shortDescription: Former U.S. Sen. Sherrod Brown is launching a bid to get back to the Senate, several news outlets are reporting.

title: Trump's meeting with Putin could impact relations
shortDescription: President Trump and Vladimir Putin's upcoming meeting could affect future sanctions on Russia, and the U.S. relationship with Ukraine.

title: The complications of Trump's marijuana announcement
shortDescription: Trump said the decision is complicated, weighing the benefits for medical reasons against other potential impacts. Here's what health experts think.

title: Doug LaMalfa faces hostile crowd in his own congressional district
shortDescription: U.S. Rep. Doug LaMalfa faced a mostly hostile crowd Monday during his first North State town hall meeting in several years.

title: Trump's tariffs on China delayed 90 days
shortDescription: President Donald Trump issued an executive order locking in 30% tariffs on goods imported from China until November.

title: Trump signs order extending US-China tariff truce by another 3 months
shortDescription: The executive order staves off triple-digit duties on Chinese goods as U.S. retailers prepared for the critical end-of-year holiday season.

title: Trump administration slams Dems for not backing crackdown on crime
shortDescription: Civil rights leaders say Trump, a longtime antagonist, is overreaching by taking over policing in the nation's capital.

title: Trump names conservative economist to lead Bureau of Labor Statistics
shortDescription: Trump fired the previous U.S. commissioner of Labor Statistics after the department reported the U.S. added a disappointing 73,000 jobs in July.

title: Trump's vision for removing homeless from DC streets
shortDescription: The president has vowed to use "involuntary commitment" to detain people sleeping on the streets of DC.

title: President Trump weighs marijuana reclassification
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said a decision on marijuana reclassification is coming in the next few weeks.

title: Trump takeover of Washington, DC rattles residents
shortDescription: Some DC residents are angry about President Trump's plans to deploy the National Guard and federalize the city's police force. Others like it.

title: DC mayor criticizes Trump police takeover but plans to cooperate
shortDescription: The mayor disputed Trump’s justification for declaring a crime emergency, noting that crime has been trending down in the city after spiking in 2023.
